Lyric:
[by:冰糖炖雪梨Shirley]
[00:12.36]I'm jealous I'm overzealous
[00:16.50]When I'm down I get real down
[00:18.80]When I'm high I don't come down
[00:20.76]But I get angry baby believe me
[00:24.95]I could love you just like that
[00:26.89]And I can leave you just as fast
[00:29.12]But you don't judge me
[00:32.88]'Cause if you did baby I would judge you too
[00:37.69]No you don't judge me
[00:41.41]'Cause if you did baby I would judge you too
[00:45.66]'Cause I got issues but you got 'em too
[00:49.82]So give 'em all to me and I'll give mine to you
[00:53.96]Bask in the glory of all our problems
[00:58.39]'Cause we got the kind of love it takes to solve 'em
[01:02.46]Yeah I got issues
[01:05.79]And one of them is how bad I need you
[01:08.00]
[01:08.57]You do shit on purpose
[01:11.09]You get mad and you break things
[01:13.29]Feel bad try to fix things
[01:15.51]But you're perfect poorly wired circuit
[01:19.60]And got hands like an ocean
[01:21.68]Push you out pull you back in
[01:24.03]'Cause you don't judge me
[01:27.54]'Cause if you did baby I would judge you too
[01:32.46]No you don't judge me
[01:36.17]'Cause you see it from the same point of view
[01:40.38]'Cause I got issues but you got 'em too
[01:44.50]So give 'em all to me and I'll give mine to you
[01:48.61]Bask in the glory of all our problems
[01:53.01]'Cause we got the kind of love it takes to solve 'em
[01:57.33]Yeah I got issues
[02:00.43]And one of them is how bad I need you
[02:02.87]
[02:35.11]'Cause I got issues but you got 'em too
[02:39.27]So give 'em all to me and I'll give mine to you
[02:43.33]Bask in the glory of all our problems
[02:47.86]'Cause we got the kind of love it takes to solve 'em
[02:52.15]Yeah I got issues
[02:55.16]And one of them is how bad I need you
[02:57.61]
